attributes.action: Let  all the  Gurkha's and their families who have served in our forces to stay  in our  country with all citizenship rights
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think it is a disgrace that they are not automatically given that right and as a labour supporter and member for over fifty years, I am  very angry that the Home Seretary had the audacity to say that they had no ties to this country, she should be sacked, no wonder you are losing the confidence of members like my-self

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
